document.full_text: france coach laurent blanc was interviewed on monday by the french football federation (fff) and the sports ministry as part of an investigation into a racism row that has plunged the game into turmoil.
document.title: france's blanc heard by investigators
lines_and_colors: france coach laurent blanc was interviewed on monday by the french football federation (fff) and the sports ministry as part of an investigation into a racism row that has plunged the game into turmoil.
